title: Delphi Complete Works of Dante Alighieri - Illustrated
description:
The Delphi Poets Series offers readers the works of literature's finest poets, with superior formatting. This volume presents the works of world poet Dante Alighieri, with beautiful illustrations, the original Italian texts and bonus material. (8MB Version 1)

* Beautifully illustrated with images relating to Dante's life and works
* Concise introductions to the poetry
* Excellent formatting of the poems
